arts.ttl: Freiburg demolish Werder Bremen with five-star performance
arts.sum: Vincenzo Grifo and Ritsu Dōan both scored twice, after an acrobatic Kiliann Sildillia effort to open the scoring, as Freiburg overpowered Werder Bremen to the tune of 5-0 on Friday evening. Ritsu Dōan celebrates with Eren Dinkçi after scoring Freiburg's fourth goal in the 76th minute - Christian Kaspar-Bartke
Freiburg recorded their fourth Bundesliga win in a row, this time crushing Werder Bremen 5-0.

arts.ttl: Werder keen to extend Werner's contract
arts.sum: Werder Bremen are said to be working on a new deal for Ole Werner.

arts.ttl: SC Freiburg prepare for kickoff on German Federal Election Weekend: “More important than football.”
arts.sum: SC Freiburg head coach Julian Schuster spoke on the coming German federal election at his Friday press conference.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs Werder Bremen preview: Two teams in contrasting form face off
arts.sum: We might be set for a fun Friday night at the Europa-Park Stadion.
